meanings.definition: A collection of photographs grouped together for a specific purpose or theme.
meanings.sent1: I created a photosets of my vacation pictures to share with my family.
meanings.sent2: She organized her photos into different photosets based on the seasons.
meanings.sent3: The photosets of funny cat pictures always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her photosets were like a treasure chest full of memories waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The photosets of colorful flowers were like a vibrant garden on my screen.

meanings.definition: The act of organizing or arranging photographs into a set or series.
meanings.sent1: After the event, the photosets creation began to showcase the best moments.
meanings.sent2: His photosets skills made it easy to find the perfect picture for the album.
meanings.sent3: The photosets assembly turned into a fun puzzle game with pictures.
meanings.sent4: She approached her work like a photosets conductor, arranging each photo with care.
meanings.sent5: The photosets arrangement was like putting together pieces of a visual story.
